remarks: A cyclically shifted word can be reconstructed by cyclically shifting it again.  Lemma for ~ erclwwlktr and ~ erclwwlkntr .  (Contributed by AV, 8-Apr-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 11-Jun-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Nov-2018.)
statement:
cshwcshid.1 $e |- ( ph -> y e. Word V ) $.
cshwcshid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( # ` x ) = ( # ` y ) ) $.
cshwcshid $p |- ( ph -> ( ( m e. ( 0 ... ( # ` y ) ) /\ x = ( y cyclShift m ) ) -> E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` x ) ) y = ( x cyclShift n ) ) ) $.
$d m n x y $.
